title: Washer/Dryer in Homes, Pendant Lighting in Kitchen, Grilling Stations
posting_body: ['Modern Living', 'Welcome to your new home, where history and modern style fuse to create the ideal living atmosphere.', 'Here, people are linked not just by rail, but by the energetic pulse of local community life.', 'Our apartments are a well-connected living hub nestled in the heart of Colorado’s most eclectic metropolitan paradise.', 'Everywhere you turn, you’re surrounded by the best food, history, and street tunes that Denver has to offer.', 'You’ve found your cool, accessible, and unique downtown Denver apartment home.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 46', 'OR Text', '46', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 640 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Built-in Computer Desks with Bookshelves*', '- Spacious Exterior Patios*', '- Glass Panel Walk-in Showers*', '- Fireplace*', '- Kitchen Island with built-in range and breakfast bar seating*', '- Washer/Dryer in Homes', '- Pendant Lighting in Kitchen', '- Built-in speakers with Bluetooth Capability*', '- Stainless Steel G.E. Appliances Including Microwave & Refrigerator w/ Ice-maker', '- Wood Plank Flooring in Kitchen & Living Areas*', '- Individual Climate Control with Energy Saving Programmable Thermostats', '- Conveniently pre-wired for high-speed data/phone/cable', '- Washer/Dryer in homes', '- Kitchen Pantry', '- Glass & Marble Mosaic Tile Backsplash in Kitchen', '- Modern Brushed-Nickel Interior Finishes', '- Relaxing Soaking Tubs*', '- Ceiling Fans', '- California Style, Walk-in Closets', '- Courtyard View*', '*In select apartment homes.', 'Community Amenities', '- Pool with Spa/Hot Tub', '- Green Building Design slated for LEED GOLD Certification', '- Bike Racks', '- Wine Cellar', '- Storage Available', '- Bike Shop', '- Clubhouse', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- Garage', '- Private Roof Top Deck with a Fire Pit and Kitchen Area', '- Business Center', '- Dog Park with Dog Run', '- Outdoor Fireplace', '- Onsite Dog Wash', '- Watch our WRS Pet Video', '- Grilling Stations', '- 24 Hour Fitness center featuring Techno Gym equipment with iPod docking station', '- Courtyard', 'Pet Policy', 'We allow up to 3 pets with a combined weight limit of 150 lbs, with breed restrictions.', 'Pet rent is $35/month per pet, and pet fee is $400 for the 1st pet, $100 for each additional.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:1:00PM-5:00PM', 'f5YGdPdl1']
